blog.title: my pride just ain't up for sale
blog.description:
yael; eighteen; she/her

the sun needs the rain to make a rainbow

body:
Underrated™ qualities of Louis Tomlinson

He’s extra. He’s so freaking extra and I don’t remember seeing people talk about this here. We all know Harry’s extra and shady af but I feel like we don’t talk about Liuis being extra enough. Getting Harry so many rings, with the latest addition being a special ring gifted for anniversaries? How extra do you have to be to give your husband a ring that represents infinite love as a gift for your anniversary? And I saw someone suggest it was “8 diamonds for 8 years” and let me just say, bitch yes. Also, going MIA while you’re husband’s in Brazil, and tweeting on the 28th? If that’s not shady and extra idk what is.

summary: For his show in São Paulo, Harry wore a custom Harris Reed look. The outfit features a silver silk lame ruffled exaggerated...
caption:
For his show in São Paulo, Harry wore a custom Harris Reed look. The outfit features a silver silk lame ruffled exaggerated pussy bow blouse, a cropped black venetian wool waistcoat and matching black flares with velvet detailing. Harry completed the look with black leather boots. Photos by Mariana Pekin.

Custom Harris Reed blouse, waistcoat and flares

tags: why am i doing this to myself
this is so soft i cant
body:
Half a heart.

Just a little something for you guys. Xx

***

It was a hard feeling on his chest knowing that he’s not in the mood for anything, because a little piece of him is missing. It was you. He left her in the other side of the world just to do what he really wants. Of course, he talked to you about him leaving, and for sure, you agreed because you can’t just stop him from doing what he loves.

A little bit of text and calls here and there because the studio was keeping him busy, it kept him occupied to do the things he used to when he was with her. You felt devasted, you never felt more alone in the world, knowing that he won’t be able to come back for 2 months crushed you inside.

Harry finds himself in his hotel room in Jamaica, staring at the ceiling thinking of everything. He released his single, and the tour dates, but why did he still feel incomplete? It was 9 in the evening, and it was probably 2 in the morning in your country.

He looked over beside him, finding his laptop, he can’t help himself but just call you and never hang up. He was craving all of her, how his soft hands came in touch with her hips, the way their lips danced together, and her open mouthed kissed along his jaw. God, he fucking missed those.

“Fuck it,” He cursed, running his hands through his hair, grabbing his laptop and immediatly calling you. After about 6-8 rings you finally answered.

And that’s when he saw her, she was a beautiful mess. The way her hair was on a messy bun, the hair Harry used to pull whenever when they’re in a make out season.

She was wearing one of her glasses, she used to wear it whenever she’s studying or reading a book, It was so cute on her.

She finally look up, giving him a warm smile when she starts placing her laptop in front of her cleaning the mess she’ve made couple hours ago.

“I miss you.” Harry blurted out, earning a smile from her. The smile that he missed for a long time, and her laugh, God, that was music through his ears.

“Miss you too, baby.” She took a deep breath and silence took over them, It wasn’t awkward or anything but they like it.

“Why are you still awake? You good?” He caused with concern, Harry doesn’t know why she’s still awake at 2 in the morning. She let out a sigh and showed her table, it was a complete mess. Her books and notebooks were all over the place. Harry knew she was about to take her final exam, and he knew it was very important to her, she was willing to risk everything just to pass her exam.

“Yeah, one of the main reasons why I haven’t called or texted you. I’m sorry.” Harry let out a sigh of relief knowing that he wasn’t the only one who’s avoiding their relationship, it was nice to keep them occupied so they can do their jobs perfectly.

“No, poppet, It’s okay. I, myself have been busy too. It’s a tough day in here in the studio.” Harry explained, earning a low grin from her.

They talked for hours and hours, and Harry can’t help but take a snap pic of her whenever she’s looking at the camera and sometimes if she’s doing a candid, It made her smile and whispered a small ‘stop’. It was his favorite habit of hers.

Harry sometimes play some soft music of his own while strumming a low guitar to make her calm down and relax for a bit. When he finished the whole song, he will hear her making a small applause making himself bow a little. It was a full laughter videochat.

“I love you, bub.” She whispered slowly, even though it was a whisper, Harry could hear every syllable. Harry smiled, if he could only grab her out of the screen and hold her as tight as he possibly can, he will.

“Love you, poppet.” He whispered back, their nicknames were made by themselves, they found each other calling them one time on their first date and it just continued until it became a nickname for them.

And that’s when they said goodbye…

Half a heart.

Just a little something for you guys. Xx

“Why are you still awake? You good?” He caused with concern, Harry doesn’t know why she’s still awake at 2 in the morning. She let out a sigh and showed her table, it was a complete mess. Her books and notebooks were all over the place. Harry knew she was about to take her final exam, and he knew it was very important to her, she was willing to risk everything just to pass her exam.

“Yeah, one of the main reasons why I haven’t called or texted you. I’m sorry.” Harry let out a sigh of relief knowing that he wasn’t the only one who’s avoiding their relationship, it was nice to keep them occupied so they can do their jobs perfectly.

“No, poppet, It’s okay. I, myself have been busy too. It’s a tough day in here in the studio.” Harry explained, earning a low grin from her.

They talked for hours and hours, and Harry can’t help but take a snap pic of her whenever she’s looking at the camera and sometimes if she’s doing a candid, It made her smile and whispered a small ‘stop’. It was his favorite habit of hers.

Harry sometimes play some soft music of his own while strumming a low guitar to make her calm down and relax for a bit. When he finished the whole song, he will hear her making a small applause making himself bow a little. It was a full laughter videochat.

“I love you, bub.” She whispered slowly, even though it was a whisper, Harry could hear every syllable. Harry smiled, if he could only grab her out of the screen and hold her as tight as he possibly can, he will.

“Love you, poppet.” He whispered back, their nicknames were made by themselves, they found each other calling them one time on their first date and it just continued until it became a nickname for them.

And that’s when they said goodbye…
trail.content:
Half a heart.

Just a little something for you guys. Xx

***

It was a hard feeling on his chest knowing that he’s not in the mood for anything, because a little piece of him is missing. It was you. He left her in the other side of the world just to do what he really wants. Of course, he talked to you about him leaving, and for sure, you agreed because you can’t just stop him from doing what he loves.

A little bit of text and calls here and there because the studio was keeping him busy, it kept him occupied to do the things he used to when he was with her. You felt devasted, you never felt more alone in the world, knowing that he won’t be able to come back for 2 months crushed you inside.

Harry finds himself in his hotel room in Jamaica, staring at the ceiling thinking of everything. He released his single, and the tour dates, but why did he still feel incomplete? It was 9 in the evening, and it was probably 2 in the morning in your country.

He looked over beside him, finding his laptop, he can’t help himself but just call you and never hang up. He was craving all of her, how his soft hands came in touch with her hips, the way their lips danced together, and her open mouthed kissed along his jaw. God, he fucking missed those.

“Fuck it,” He cursed, running his hands through his hair, grabbing his laptop and immediatly calling you. After about 6-8 rings you finally answered.

And that’s when he saw her, she was a beautiful mess. The way her hair was on a messy bun, the hair Harry used to pull whenever when they’re in a make out season.

She was wearing one of her glasses, she used to wear it whenever she’s studying or reading a book, It was so cute on her.

She finally look up, giving him a warm smile when she starts placing her laptop in front of her cleaning the mess she’ve made couple hours ago.

“I miss you.” Harry blurted out, earning a smile from her. The smile that he missed for a long time, and her laugh, God, that was music through his ears.

“Miss you too, baby.” She took a deep breath and silence took over them, It wasn’t awkward or anything but they like it.

“Why are you still awake? You good?” He caused with concern, Harry doesn’t know why she’s still awake at 2 in the morning. She let out a sigh and showed her table, it was a complete mess. Her books and notebooks were all over the place. Harry knew she was about to take her final exam, and he knew it was very important to her, she was willing to risk everything just to pass her exam.

“Yeah, one of the main reasons why I haven’t called or texted you. I’m sorry.” Harry let out a sigh of relief knowing that he wasn’t the only one who’s avoiding their relationship, it was nice to keep them occupied so they can do their jobs perfectly.

“No, poppet, It’s okay. I, myself have been busy too. It’s a tough day in here in the studio.” Harry explained, earning a low grin from her.

They talked for hours and hours, and Harry can’t help but take a snap pic of her whenever she’s looking at the camera and sometimes if she’s doing a candid, It made her smile and whispered a small ‘stop’. It was his favorite habit of hers.

Harry sometimes play some soft music of his own while strumming a low guitar to make her calm down and relax for a bit. When he finished the whole song, he will hear her making a small applause making himself bow a little. It was a full laughter videochat.

“I love you, bub.” She whispered slowly, even though it was a whisper, Harry could hear every syllable. Harry smiled, if he could only grab her out of the screen and hold her as tight as he possibly can, he will.

“Love you, poppet.” He whispered back, their nicknames were made by themselves, they found each other calling them one time on their first date and it just continued until it became a nickname for them.

And that’s when they said goodbye…
